name.ja: バッファード・スライム

requirement.en: When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack.

effect.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard. This turn, you take no battle damage. Also, if your LP are 3000 or more, take 2000 damage.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
